fn.p: Edited by: Flavia Guzzo, Università degli Studi di Verona, Italy

Reviewed by: Alejandro Urzua, Universidad de Santiago de Chile, Chile; Inger Martinussen, Norwegian Institute of Bioeconomy Research (NIBIO), Norway; Adam Matkowski, Wroclaw Medical University, Poland
This article was submitted to Plant Metabolism and Chemodiversity, a section of the journal Frontiers in Plant Science
